messages.title: The Tories want local schools to be run by companies for profit
messages.content: The Lib Dems in government STOPPED them

messages.title: Only the Lib Dems in government are getting the job done for Portsmouth families
messages.content:
Free school meals for all infants
£9.4 million extra funding for Portsmouth schools
7,720 new apprenticeships for young people in Portsmouth
1,000 new primary classroom spaces for Portsmouth students

messages.title: Only the Lib Dems can stop the Tories in Portsmouth
messages.content: Labour and UKIP cannot win here. Only the Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives here in Portsmouth South.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Free school meals for all infants, £9.4 million extra funding for Portsmouth schools, 7,720 new apprenticeships for young people in Portsmouth, 1,000 new primary classroom spaces for Portsmouth students

images.caption: Should our schools be run by companies for profit?
